file_content.text: Your signs speak well of you. But this Findsman must continue his work.
This Findsman has read your success in the dust and footprints of this place. Let him see you.
Yes. Your signs are changed, and speak to him clearly. Ellrak gone, and enlightenment gained.
This Findsman will see your gathered knowledge reaches Master Halykus. The signs speak of time, water, age, darkness.... The truth must be known.
This Findsman will continue his meditations, until you have the signs he needs.
This Findsman would speak with you. Your face, your walk... they speak signs to him.
This Findsman has come to aid those who suffer here, by following these Gormak that harry them.
Republic scouts seek in one way, but this Findsman uses another. He finds truth in footsteps, in echoes, in patterns of light. Perhaps his seeking is strange to you.
I understand. Not everything we know comes from mundane sources.
No stranger than the Force.
I won't scorn wisdom, no matter where it comes from.
Knowledge is found everywhere.
To read the movement of clouds, count falling leaves and see data--this is a Findsman's task.
I can respect your skills. I serve alongside another Findsman, Yuun.
No, I have a Findsman.
A Findsman with a name? Then this Findsman would value your help even more.
This galaxy would be a boring gray ball if we were all the same.
Everyone's different.
You speak a great truth. But this Findsman is concerned with smaller ones.
You look like an ordinary Gand to me.
What is a "Findsman"?
The Findsmen read the world to find what--or whom--must be found. This Findsman has been bounty hunter, scout and investigator.
What do you mean?
Truth is built of emotion, events, context and memory. Science answers only a few. This Findsman needs all.
The Gormak scouts are led by Ellrak, a being full of anger and cunning. He has done great harm, and no Republic scout can find him.
This Findsman would show you Findsman ways. To find Ellrak, and learn the Gormak signs. It will help in your search for what they seek.
If you need these signs to finish your investigation, I'll do what I can.
I can do that.
What's the first step?
This Findsman uses a scanner to record signs, for meditation. Use it to see what must be seen, and follow what it shows you.
Bird flights suggest beginning at the nearby survey station, the last place raided by Ellrak's men. Let the signs guide you from there.
This Findsman offers his thanks. He will meditate until you return.
Not a chance. [Refuse quest]
This Findsman read you wrongly? He must meditate on this.
This Findsman cannot read you. Not now.
That could be useful.
